name: Waky Driver
description:
Tricky, speedy and funny car game !

Very simple rules!

  • Go as fast as you can but without skidding;
  • Complete the track in the shortest time possible by gaining precious seconds;
  • The more seconds you save and the more medals you win;
  • Win as many medals as you can;
  • Unlocks all tracks;
  • Be careful not to try the patience of the other drivers.

Available for Android, Mac, Windows

Controls:

  • You have only your throttle! 
  • Tap (or click) on the ring on the bottom right of the screen. 
  • The more you tap the more increase your speed, the ring also change its color.
  • On desktop versions you can also use keyboard SPACE BAR .

TIPs:

  • You can change your car simply clicking on it while you are in the start menu or in the tracks selection page.
  • You can select your preferred view clicking on the camera icon.
